name: oxidization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of a substance or chemical element oxidizing: Oxidization has turned the rocks bright mauve, ochre, green, turquoise, and purple. See
oxidize
More examplesFewer examplesTubes are the ideal container for oil paints because they dry by oxidisation.After the ingredients have been sliced, their shelf life is cut basically in half through oxidization. Cooking increases the risk of atherosclerosis due to increased oxidization of the cholesterol contained in the egg yolk.Free-radical damage is the result of oxidisation in the cells of the body.
